text: How to Win Friends and Influence People is a self-help book. It was written by Dale Carnegie and first published in 1936. It is one of the best selling self- help books ever published. Since 1936, over 15 million copies have been sold worldwide.The Financial Post on Dale Carnegie: "Dale Carnegie's How to Win Friends and Influence People, the gold standard of the genre, has sold more than 15 million copies since it was first published in 1937". (5 April 2008) ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1936 books Category:Self- help books
title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
